Constructor Detail

OrderHandler

public OrderHandler(GameObject unit)
Create a new order handler

Parameters:
unit - unit for which this order handler will be used
Method Detail

update

public void update()
Checks the current queued order whether it's complete. If it isn't, keep going. If it is, get next order from queue.

queueOrder

public void queueOrder(Order order)
Put an order in the queue.

Parameters:
order - Order to queue.

order

public void order(Order order)
Perform this order now. Cancels all other orders.

Parameters:
order - Order to perform.

getOrders

public java.util.Queue<Order> getOrders()
Get the list of orders for this order handler.

Returns:
queue of orders to be executed

getUnit

public GameObject getUnit()
Get the unit that this order handler manages.

Returns:
unit for which this order handler was created
